title: LFM Bronze to Gold to join my team!
body:
Just started a semi serious team and would like to fill it with members. 
Just fill this out:
IGN: 
Main role:
Rank: 
Skype (yes or no):

replies.body:
IGN: LGA Ironsnake
Main role: Jungle/Supp
Rank: Unranked (B1 80lp last season, aiming for silver this season)
Skype (yes or no):Yes, but prefer ts/mumble/curse/razercomms

IGN: Mistress Athena
Main Role: Support 
Rank: B3 (Silver V last season)
Skype: Yes (just ask for my skype name)

I tried making my own ranked team... but I can never get 5 people online at the same time that actually feel like playing ranked = =

Main Role:Jungle/ADC
Rank: S2
Skype: Yes
Ive added you both on league :)
